title: Boris Johnson's Poll Tax Moment? (with Chris Matheson MP)
itunes:title: Boris Johnson's Poll Tax Moment? (with Chris Matheson MP)
description:
Boris Johnson faces another day of pressure to take action over Dominic Cummings's trip to Durham during lockdown. Chris Matheson, Labour MP for the City of Chester, tells Bloomberg Westminster's Roger Hearing and Sebastian Salek the Downing Street adviser is skating on thin ice.

And, Tim Bale, politics professor at Queen Mary University of London, explains why this could be the prime minister's poll tax moment.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
